format: A data frame with 30000 rows and 4 variables

parameters.LateApril: Credit card payment is late in April 2005
parameters.LateSept: Credit card payment is late in Sept 2005
parameters.BillApril: Total bill in April 2005 in thousands of New Taiwan Dollars

title: Data on Taiwanese Credit Card Holders
description:
Description
Data from the UCI Machine Learning Repository on Taiwanese credit card holders, the amount of their credit card bill, and whether their payment was late.
reference: This data is used in the Matching chapter of The Effect by Huntington-Klein.
